entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
